rows.label: qev087703_MSG0001
rows.name: Your arrival is most welcome, humans. But how did you...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0002
rows.name: A Wrothian named Ni Zain sent us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0003
rows.name: He was hurt pretty bad, but he insisted we help you first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0004
rows.name: It seems I have been blessed with exceedingly loyal vassals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0005
rows.name: My prince...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0006
rows.name:
Elma, was it? I would ask your aid again,
if you would offer it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0007
rows.name:
Assist us in destroying the Wrothian Skells
that remain under Ganglion control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev087703_SEL0011
rows.name: Aid Ga Jiarg in destroying the Skells.

rows.label: qev087703_JNK0020
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev087703_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest capturing the Skells instead of destroying them.

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0008
rows.name: You have my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0009
rows.name: I can abide our machines being used by such filth no longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0010
rows.name:
When the Ganglion replicated the original,
they made...changes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0011
rows.name: Organic sensors within the replicas lock out Wrothian pilots.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0012
rows.name:
There is little point in reclaiming
something we can no longer use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0013
rows.name:
Best then to destroy them,
so they cannot be used for further evil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0014
rows.name: Makes sense to me. Let's go take 'em down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0015
rows.name:
We already destroyed three.
That should leave 10 more somewhere in the area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_JNK0030
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev087703_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest each of you take out half the remaining Skells.

rows.label: qev087703_JNK0040
rows.name: Wager

rows.label: qev087703_SEL0041
rows.name:
Challenge Ga Jiarg to see
who can destroy six Skells first.

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0016
rows.name: We will destroy any and all that we see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0017
rows.name: I ask that you show no mercy to those you find as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0018
rows.name: Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0019
rows.name: I like this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0020
rows.name: You will not see us lose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0021
rows.name: Very well. May the hunt begin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087703_MSG0022
rows.name: We will ensure you only have to bother with a few...[ST:wait ]
